transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello aawaz aa rahi hai?
Customer: Yes mam.
Executive: Sir ye mere ko na matlab maine query dali hui hai IndiaMART pe par ye na door door ki location dikha raha hai mere ko Gurgaon ki location mein na ek 3 inch ka mere ko burger bun ka wo chahiye ring chahiye. Burger bun banate hain na uska.
Executive: Ji ji ji.
Customer: Haan mam aap se baat kar rahi hoon.
Customer: Main Gurgaon se hi bol rahi hoon.

Executive: Ek second mam company open kar leta hoon main.


Executive: Ji mam.
Customer: 3 inch ka stainless steel ring burger bun.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Mam actually apne company profile name kya hoga mam?
Customer: Pashinath Private Limited.
Executive: Kya mam?
Customer: Hamari company ka naam Pashinath hai Pashinath Private Limited.

Executive: P A S H W I N A T H?
Customer: Haan ji P A S H I N A T H.
Executive: Yaha pe to company show hi nahi kar rahi mobile number kya hai register mobile number?
Customer: Yahi hai 905343
Executive: 905343
Customer: 7821
Executive: 7821

Executive: Varsha mam bol rahi hai?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: To mam ab kya exactly kya query thi aapka?
Customer: Mere ko na 3 inch mein stainless steel burger bun ring chahiye.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: To mam uske liye aapne usme dala tha by list pe?
Customer: Haan maine usme dala tha par wo Chennai se aur Mumbai se aa rahe hain usme. Mere ko Gurgaon ka chahiye.
Executive: Gurgaon se main dekh leta hoon agar koi hai ki nahi waha pe.
Executive: Mam mam hamari pata hai din me discussion hua tha mam welcome call hi pending thi.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: To mam ek kaam karte hain na to usko discussion kar lete hain aur yaha pe bhi hum usko bhi dekh lenge. Agar koi aas paas ki location pe hoga. To isko bhi hum yaha pe dekh lete hain.
Customer: Welcome call call mein na thoda net chahiye mere ko usme yaha pe na net mein kafi problem aa rahi hai maine koshish ki thi par wo ho nahi raha tha net se.
Executive: Exact to mujhko pata bhi nahi chal payega agar samne se aap mujhe dekh rahi hoti screen.
Executive: Exact mein yaha pe dekh dekh hi leta. Paneer patty burger bun.
Executive: Burger bun machine chahiye na hume?
Customer: Burger bun 3 inch mein ring hai ek stainless ring.
Executive: Achha. Matlab wo shape banata hai wo burger bun ka 3 inch mein shape banati hai wo ring hai.
Executive: Dekh leta hoon agar koi yaha pe agar yaha ka aas paas ka location ka hoga na.
Customer: [unintelligible]
Executive: Burger bun 3 inch.
Executive: Stainless steel ring.


Executive: Nahi ye ring ka jo hai na mam present time pe agar main dekhu to IndiaMART mein to koi aas paas ka hai nahi. Amazon wagaira mein yaha pe show kar raha hai.
Customer: Kaha pe hai ye?

Executive: Jaise ye steel agar IndiaMART usme
Customer: Delhi mein hai?
Executive: Nahi alag alag location pe show ho raha hai. Main yaha pe koshish karta hoon ki Delhi ka yaha pe ek kaam kariye mam. Main 5 minute mujhko dijiye. Main yaha pe detail nikal ke agar koi mujhe samajh mein aata hai ki Delhi ke aas paas ka hoga ya to Haryana ka hoga. To main aapko batata hoon.
Customer: Gurgaon Gurgaon ka.
Executive: Gurgaon ka. Haan agar Gurgaon mein mil gaya to fir aap hi le aayenge na Delhi mein support karana padega.
Executive: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Needs a 3-inch stainless steel burger bun ring.

- Wants the product to be available in Gurgaon.

- Facing internet issues for welcome call.



Resolution:

- Executive checked for availability in Gurgaon.

- Executive offered to check nearby locations.

- Executive will check details and call back.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back in 5 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Annoyed -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, location, welcome call, product availability
